entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:42 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
